body.p: The has a user-friendly Dashboard and if a particular plugin registers a create or open action, then it will include sections for creating and opening documents for plugin integrations.
body.section:
Create a New DocumentTo create a new document, follow these steps:
Go to your Dashboard page.
In the New section, click the icon for the particular plugin. This opens a dialog box that allows you to select a new file template.If your connection has not yet been configured, a configuration dialog box will be displayed that provides instructions for configuring and selecting the URL for the connection.
Select a file template and click OK. This opens a dialog box that allows you browse for a destination path.
Select a destination path and name for the new document. The new document will be opened in a new tab.

Open a DocumentTo open a document, follow these steps:
Go to your Dashboard page.
In the Open section, click the icon for the particular plugin. This opens a Browse remote files dialog box that allows you to browse for a file.If your connection has not yet been configured, a configuration dialog box will be displayed that provides instructions for configuring and selecting the URL for the connection.
To change the repository, click the Edit button in the top-right corner and select the repository and branch in the subsequent dialog box.
Once you have found the file you want to open, select it and click OK. The selected document will be opened in a new tab.
